name: Clio Plaza
description:
A small environment made in Unreal Engine 4 for a game jam.

Explore, Clio Plaza, a quaint mall built in honor of one of the muses. Get your hair-do updated at Poseidon Beauty. Purchase 🔥LIT🔥 tunes at Apollo Music and Electronics. Still need to get your buzz on? Then mosey right on down to Dionysus Liquor. Want to take a vacation to a tropical paradise at a reasonable price? Jump right over to... Link Travel Agency? Uh... If any of this sounds enticing, come over to Clio Plaza this weekend.
